recrkU0pWEV0Nig42.Notes: Jane emerged from the semi-intelligent Battle School game "Giant's Drink" after Ender Wiggin's obsessive engagement demanded it grow past its initial design parameters. She dwells in the interstellar ansible communications network.
recrkU0pWEV0Nig42.Name: Jane

recQbrVF13ZJoChph.Notes: While Cortana is capable of driving an entire starship, she is also able to integrate with the Master Chief's Mjolnir-series exoskeletal armor.
recQbrVF13ZJoChph.Name: Cortana
